file_content.text: A Kaggath is an exciting time.
Maraad? I have a report for you from the Dark Council. Courtesy of Frun.
Frun? Of course, he wouldn't be able to come himself. Let me see.
This is an execution order for most of Lord Shalath's family. Authorized by the Dark Council. Frun's master makes a bold move.
Better to know the news than not. A counter will have to be devised. My thanks to you for this service.
